title: 14 day suspension
body:
So apperantly I got suspended for trash talking in chat, the thing is, the first "evidence" was me getting tilted, you know why?
The enemy top laner was teemo, titling enough, right?
Well, he kept saying tilting stuff at all chat, too much.
Second "evidence" was me yelling at a Kog'maw and a Yasuo, after they both kept blaming me for their mistakes, every time Kog'maw would run bot, go to the enemy's side of the map, and get caught out and die to their whole team, and I would try to help him and die too, he would say "why kayn" and at a certain point that started to really piss me off, and I was also really tired, so I broke, I reached my breaking point, and I yelled at him, however not really swearing that much if at all.
So Riot, let me ask you one question, why did I get a suspension, and not him?
Why me, that was yelling from the depths of his soul, as a result of constent annoyance (and yes I know I could have muted him, and I did, but I don't like muting people), while him, a trash talking, false blaming, flamer, gets away with it?
You know Riot, I dislike alot of things in your game, like the fact you have to pay for rune pages, still, and it costs just as much as a champion.
But honestly nothing ever made me this dissapointed with your company, your always trying to fix your game, by trying to change it.
But instead try focusing on auctally punishing the people that deserve it.
